function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on perception of green spaces","Impact":"Increased value placed on outdoor green spaces","Mitigation":"Ensure access to green spaces for urban citizens","Technologies":"Green roof installations, urban planning","People":"Urban citizens","Owner":"City planners, urban developers"},{"Description":"Inconsistency in drivers for WTP for green roofs","Impact":"Uncertain demand for green roofs","Mitigation":"Conduct market research, standardize offerings","Technologies":"Market research tools, standardized green roof designs","People":"Green roof manufacturers, urban developers","Owner":"Market research analysts, urban planners"}]}
